attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sheriff Joe Arpaio created the 'tent city jail' to save Arizona from spending tens of million of dollars on another expensive prison complex.

He makes the inmates work in chain gangs. Their meal cost 40 cents.They actually spend 3 times the amount of money on a meal for police dogs
A couple of weeks ago I watched a documentary about him. Absolutely brilliant. Maybe we should take a leaf out of his book! This is why he gets re-elected again and again.

You can google his name.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
